entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Runs in Windows Emulator, Throws System.NullReferenceException error in Android Emulator. Don't know where to start. #10249
  • Bug with WebView #10246
    Backlog
  • Updating Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK to 1.2 experimental breaks Titles on Shell #10244
    Backlog
  • Navigation not working on Windows #10241
  • Size not calculated properly when invoking UseMauiCompatibility method in MauiProgram #10238
    Backlog
  • Unable to record custom aot profile. #10237
    Backlog
  • AOT everything is not AOTing everything #10236
    Backlog
  • NavigationView cannot be null with navigation in modal #10235
    Backlog
  • Unable to build a project with net7 RC 1 #10234
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • await Shell.Current.GoToAsync(sPageName) results in An unhandled win32 exception occurred in [41992] #10084
  • Entry.Completed and Entry.ReturnCommand not executed #8960
    7.0-rc2
  • EF Core with Sqlite throws System.ExecutionEngineException running on iOS Device (Release) #9176

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Updated used ListViewItem style (avoid CornerRadius etc) #10250

Merged

  • [Android] Don't null binding context when recycling items #10245
  • [Windows] Fix issue with items not filling horizontal space in CollectionView #10243
  • [Android] Fire Completed event using ReturnType.Search #9632
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 7.0-rc2
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10232
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [android] bring back `$(AndroidLinkResources)` by default #10153
    platform/android 🤖, area/app-size 🤏, area/perf 🏎️, 7.0
  • [iOS] Implement IsEnabled property on Editor #7611
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 7.0
  • Fix SwitchCell not compliant with best accessibility practices #6899
    area/a11y, community ✨, 7.0
